book_1.verse_1: Sing, O goddess, the anger of Achilles son of Peleus...
book_1.verse_2: The will of Zeus was accomplished...

book_1.verse_1: Tell me, O Muse, of that ingenious hero...
book_1.verse_2: He suffered much and gained wisdom in his journey.

interpretation.verse_1: Reflects on divine inspiration and human conflict.
interpretation.verse_2: Symbolizes the pursuit of wisdom through struggle.
